name: Michael misfortunate
description:
You crashed on an island. Find a way to escape before the volcano erupts.

Has 5 different endings

Instructions:
  1. TAB - build menu
  2. F - flashlight
  3. E - pick up / chop tree
  4. RMB - place 
  5. mouse wheel - turn object
  6. wasd - move
All the endings:
  1. Drowning
  2. Eruption
  3. Escape by boat
  4. Escape by raft
  5. Escape by helicopter
